text: Ra juna manisaharu aphno palanakartasita dara mandathe, uniharu samuha–samuha gari svargatira laginechan, yahamsam'ma ki jaba uniharu tyasako najika pugnechan, ta tyasaka dvaraharu kholidi'inechan ra tyasaka dvarapalale uniharusita bhannechanh ki ‘‘timimathi salama. Timi praphullita bha'ihala. Aba yasama sadhainko nimti pravesa garihala
